title: NEED ONE MONTH FREE??? SENIOR?? CALL TODAY!!!
posting_body: ['WELCOME HOME TO ROBERT HOLMES MANOR!!!', 'WE ARE NOW ACCEPTING APPLICATIONS FOR AGES 62 YEARS AND OLDER', 'FOR BOTH OUR STUDIO AND ONE BEDROOM APARTMENT HOMES!!!', 'RENTAL ASSISTANCE IS AVAILABLE TO THOSE WHO QUALIFY!', 'NO APPLICATION FEES!', 'PLUS, ONE MONTH FEE (MENTION THIS AD)', 'ROBERT HOLMES MANOR APARTMENT HOMES AMMENTIES INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING:', '* PAID UTILITIES', '* REFRIGERATOR', '* RANGE/STOVE', '* GARBAGE DISPOSAL', '* AIR CONDITIONING', '* LAUNDRY IN BUILDING', '* INTERCOM ENTRY', '* 24 HOUR MAINTENANCE', '* SECURITY SERVICE', '* COMMUNITY ROOM', '* SERVICE COORDINATOR', '* SECURED OFF STREET PARKING', "ROBERT HOLMES MANOR IS LOCATED IN THE HEART OF DETROIT'S MIDTOWN COMMUNITY.", "ROBERT HOLMES MANOR IS LOCATED NEAR DETROIT'S MAIN ATTRACTIONS SUCH AS:", '* CHARLES H. WRIGHT MUSEUM FOR AFRICAN AMERICAN HISTORY', '* DETROIT INSTITUTE OF ARTS', '* MICHIGAN SCIENCE CENTER', '* DETROIT MEDICAL CENTER - MAIN CAMPUS', '* WAYNE STATE UNIVERSITY', '* DETROIT HISTORICAL MUSEUM', '* LCA ARENA', '* COMERICA PARK', '* EASTERN MARKET', 'ROBERT HOLMES MANOR IS LOCATED NEAR RETAIL SHOPPING, PHARMACIES, MEDICAL FACILITIES AND OTHER AMMENTIES FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE!', 'RENTAL APPLICATIONS ARE AVAILABLE ANYTIME!', 'HAVE WE SPARKED YOUR INTEREST???', 'HAVE QUESTIONS???', 'GIVE US A CALL TODAY!!!', 'show contact info', 'ROBERT HOLMES MANOR LEASING/MANAGEMENT OFFICE HOURS:', 'MONDAY, TUESDAY, THURSDAY AND FRIDAY', '10:00 AM - 4:00 PM (CLOSED WEDNESDAY)', 'TO RETURN APPLICATIONS PLEASE CALL TO SCHEDULE APPOINTMENT', 'show contact info', 'WE LOOK FORWARD TO ASSISTING YOU WITH YOUR HOUSING NEEDS!']
